H0.text: Krebs is the cycle that is part of cellular respiration and makes ATP and NADH.

H1.text: Vireos are the cycle that is part of cellular respiration and makes ATP and NAPH.

H2.text: Water cycle is part of cellular respiration and makes atp and naph.

H3.text: Carbon cycle is part of cellular respiration and makes ATP and NADH.

A4.text: The citric acid cycle releases the energy stored in nutrients through acetylâ€‘CoA oxidation.

A5.text: The NADH generated by the citric acid cycle is fed into the oxidative phosphorylation (electron transport) pathway.
